notifications-denied.title: Notifications Disabled
notifications-denied.message: You have not allowed the app permission to send you notifications notifications. You can enable them in your phone's settings.

subscribe-confirmed.title: You're Subscribed!
subscribe-confirmed.message: You'll get a notification with the latest news and updates from AfrikaBurn. You can unsubscribe at any time.

subscribe-error.title: Eish!
subscribe-error.message: Soz, something broke and we couldn't subscribe you to the news alerts. You can try again if you want, but this problem has been noted!

unsubscribe-confirm.title: Are you sure?
unsubscribe-confirm.message: You are about to turn of your news alerts from Afrikaburn, are you sure you wanna do this?

unsubscribe-confirmed.title: You're Unsubscribed!
unsubscribe-confirmed.message: Coolio, you won't get any more news alerts. You can subscribe again at any time.
